titles.title: Recognizing November 30, 2024, as Yom Haplitim or Jewish Refugee Day.
Recognizing November 30, 2024, as Yom Haplitim or Jewish Refugee Day.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
